description: Creates a service principal name (SPN) for the service account in Active Directory. Kerberos authentication uses SPNs to associate a service instance with a service sign-in account.

ConnectorArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called [CreateConnector.html](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/pca-connector-ad/latest/APIReference/API_CreateConnector.html) .

DirectoryRegistrationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called [CreateDirectoryRegistration](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/pca-connector-ad/latest/APIReference/API_CreateDirectoryRegistration.html) .
